name: Fishing Trip (Ryan Miller)
description:
Fishing Trip is a cozy fishing game where you travel between your favourite fishing spots to help fish back to their homes.

Instructions: All you need is your mouse. Click and drag your fishing pole like a slingshot to cast, and click to catch fish once they take a bite.

You can look back at the development of this game over on this twitter thread or this mastodon thread,

This game was made in just one weekend for Toronto Game Jam 2022 by Ryan Miller. Nature graphics are "The Illustrated Nature" by Artkovski from the Asset Store. All other models made by me.
